connectivity: USB 2.0 hi-speed, PC/AV Out, HDMI (Micro Type-D), DC Input Terminal
exposure modes: Auto Mode, Program AE, Shutter priority, Aperture priority, Manual Mode
flash modes: Flash Off, Flash Auto, Flash ON, Slow Sync., Slow Sync.+ Red-Eye, Red-Eye Reduction
focus range: Normal: 0.6m to infinity(wide), 3.0m to infinity (tele); Macro: 0.3m (wide to mid zoom); 1cm Macro: 0.01m (at mid zoom, set automatically)
lens: smc PENTAX zoom lens - 15 elements in 13 groups (6 aspherical elements)
metering method: TTL metering. Choice of Face, Centre-weighted, Spot
white balance modes: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Fluorescent, Fluorescent CWF, Incandescent, Manual WB, Colour Temp
